chatbot.title: Virtual Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hello! Welcome to my virtual assistant. ðŸ‘‹
chatbot.help: How can I help you today?

optionMessages.contact: I want to get in touch

responses.info: I'm a fullstack developer with experience in React, Next.js, Node.js, and other technologies. Specialized in creating modern, high-performance web solutions.
responses.services: I offer web development, mobile applications, chatbots, ecommerce, and technology consulting services. Each solution is customized to meet the specific needs of the client.

chatbot.startForm: Great! I'll need some information to better assist you.

ask.phone: What's your phone number for contact?
ask.name: What's your name?
ask.contactType: Would you prefer to speak directly with me or leave a message detailing your issue?

validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number.
validation.name: Please enter a valid name.
validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.contactType: Please choose an option (speak directly or leave message).

success.direct: Thank you! I'll contact you directly soon via the phone number provided.
success.message: Thank you! Your request has been registered. I'll contact you soon to discuss your issue.

chatbot.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again later or contact me through another method.
chatbot.fallback: Sorry, I didn't understand your question. How can I help?
chatbot.moreHelp: Can I help you with anything else?
